name: code-server-oss
description: Packaged [Microsoft Code-Server](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/remote/vscode-server), compiled from sources. Basically, this is an OSS version of code-server.

scripts.build: npm run build-docker && npm run extract-artifacts && npm run vendor-node
